EmailTemplate.name: Dads & Grad Gift Guide Email Newspaper Markets
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing the Dads and Grads Gift Guide
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DealChicken invites you to be part of our Dads & Grads gift guide. From electronics to barbecue supplies, DealChicken's Dads & Grads promotion makes it easy for online shoppers to discover and connect with neighborhood merchants. A new merchant will be featured daily June 3-16 during our exclusive promotion. For more information, download our Dads & Grads gift guide information sheet.
To reserve one of 14 featured Dads & Grads gift guide positions, contact {!Contact.OwnerFirstName} {!Contact.OwnerLastName} by May 20th at {!Contact.OwnerEmail} or {!Contact.OwnerPhone}.
DealChicken alerts consumers to great deals. Consumers purchase the deal on DealChicken.com and redeem at your location or website. Merchants receive a revenue split less a 2.5% credit card processing fee.
Why try DealChicken? Hear how DealChicken can transform your business and bring in new, high-quality customers
